snippet.title: 1080p digital photo viewer puts family pics on your big screen
snippet.description: ...PIE United has announced what it claims to be the worlds first HDMI 1080p digital photo viewer. The device allows users to view digital photos and video on a big screen 1080p HDTV directly from a memory card. Some newer digital cameras have HDMI outallowing you to look at photos or watch video...

snippet.title: Over 3 years later, "deleted" Facebook photos are still online
snippet.description: ...Facebook is still working on deleting photos from its servers in a timely manner nearly three years.... In the meantime, photos that users thought they "deleted" from the social network months or even years ago remain accessible via direct link. The problem: "deleted" photos never go awayWhen...
